6.66: Increased base  strength from 20 to 25.  Soul Assumption Added a charge indicator in the hud and above Visage, which are only visible to Visage. Reduced charge gain damage threshold from 130 to 110. Reduced manacost from 100/120/140/160 to 100 on each level. Reduced cooldown from 7/6/5/4 to 4 on each level.  Summon Familiars Familiars are now ranged units with 160 attack range, instead of melee. Increased number of attack charges from 6 to 7 (total damage from 72/90/108 to 84/105/126). Increased magic resistance from 70%/95%/95% to 95% on each level. Reduced gold bounty from 150 to 100.
6.65: Increased base  strength and gain from 17 + 1.75 to 20 + 2.2. Reduced base  agility and gain from 17 + 2 to 11 + 1.3. Increased base  intelligence and gain from 19 + 2.45 to 21 + 2.5. Increased base attack damage from 14-24 to 24-34 (total attack damage is now 45-55). Increased movement speed from 285 to 295.  Grave Chill Increased movement speed slow/bonus from 8%/16%/24%/32% to 32% on each level. Increased attack speed slow/bonus from 8/16/24/32 to 32 on each level. Reduced enemy slow duration from 10 on each level to 3/4/5/6. Reduced self speed duration from 15 on each level to 3/4/5/6. Reduced manacost from 110/120/130/140 to 70/80/90/100. Reduced cooldown from 18 to 10.
6.00: Reworked Visage. Replaced Frenzy with  Grave Chill
6.68: Increased  Soul Assumption manacost from 100 to 150.  Gravekeeper's Cloak Reduced armor bonus per layer from 2/3/4/5 to 1/2/4/5. Reduced magic resistance bonus per layer from 4%/8%/12%/16% to 3%/6%/12%/16%.  Summon Familiars Reduced damage per charge from 12/15/18 to 8/14/22 (total damage from 84/105/126 to 56/98/154). Rescaled cooldown from 160 on each level to 180/160/140.
6.19: Removed Grave Bind from the Revenants.
6.07: Fixed memory leak issues with  Soul Assumption.
6.79: Reduced base armor from -1 to -2 (total armor is now -0.46). Reduced base magic resistance from 25% to 10%.
6.05: Reduced  Soul Assumption cast range from 700 to 600 (matches attack range now).
6.50: Reduced  Grave Chill cooldown from 25 to 18. Reworked  Soul Assumption
6.31: Revenants are now spell immune on level 3.
6.13: Reduced  Soul Assumption manacost from 18/22/26/30 to 5/10/15/20.
6.33: Fixed  Gravekeeper's Cloak radius being 400, instead of 600 as stated.
6.36: Reduced  Gravekeeper's Cloak reflected damage from 7%/14%/21%/28% to 6%/12%/18%/24%.
6.02: Anonymous Dead Increased number of bound units from 3 to 5. Increased damage shared from 5%/10%/15%/20% to 7%/14%/21%/28%.
6.36b: Soul Assumption now has a 3/0/0/0 second cooldown. Reduced  Gravekeeper's Cloak reflected damage from 6%/12%/18%/24% to 5%/10%/15%/20%.
6.55: Reduced Revenants vision range from 1600/1000 to 1200/600.
6.53: Fixed  Soul Assumption healing/granting stacks upon buying items.
6.84b: Familiars hit requirement reduced from 4 hero/8 tower/16 non-hero attacks to 3 hero/6 tower/12 non-hero attacks.
6.75: Increased base  intelligence from 21 to 24. Increased  Grave Chill attack speed slow/bonus from 32 to 64. Increased  Soul Assumption damage per charge from 60 to 65. Reduced Familiars base attack time from 0.6 to 0.4.
6.74: Reduced  Gravekeeper's Cloak layer recharge time from 14/12/10/8 to 12/10/8/6. Increased Familiars armor from 0 on each level to 0/1/2.
6.17: Anonymous Dead can no longer be cast on and can no longer bind allied units (can only bind own units now).
6.73: Reduced  Soul Assumption manacost from 200/180/160/140 to 170/160/150/140. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Visage: Increases  Summon Familiars number of Familiars from 2 to 3.
6.72: Rescaled base  strength and gain from 25 + 2.2 to 22 + 2.4. Increased  Soul Assumption manacost from 150 on each level to 200/180/160/140. Increased Familiars health from 300/400/500 to 300/450/600.
6.58: Raise Revenants No longer have spell immunity on level 3. Reduced max Revenants from 5/6/7 to 4/5/6. Reduced Revenants vision range from 1200/600 to 600/300. Increased attack damage from 26-29/36-39/46-49 to 40-40/46-46/52-52.
6.80: Reduced movement speed from 290 to 285. Increased  Grave Chill manacost from 70/80/90/100 to 100 on each level. Familiars are now properly spell immune, instead of having 96% magic resistance and immunity to disables.
6.81: Increased  Grave Chill cooldown from 10 on each level to 16/14/12/10.
6.82: Reduced  Stone Form cooldown from 30 to 26.
6.83: Reduced  Gravekeeper's Cloak layer recharge time from 12/10/8/6 to 6 on each level.
6.84: Reduced  Gravekeeper's Cloak layer recharge time from 6 to 4.  Summon Familiars Familiars no longer have 300/450/600 health. Familiars now require 4 hero attacks/8 tower attacks/16 non-hero unit attacks to be destroyed.
6.20: Grave Chill Reduced movement speed slow/bonus from 10%/20%/30%/40% to 8%/16%/24%/32%. Reduced attack speed slow/bonus from 10/20/30/40 to 8/16/24/32. Replaced Anonymous Dead with  Gravekeeper's Cloak
6.28: Changed  Gravekeeper's Cloak legacy hotkey from G to V (to prevent hotkey conflicts with Grave Chill). Changed Raise Revenants legacy hotkey from V to E (to prevent hotkey conflicts with Gravekeeper's Cloak).
